    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol

    [create]                                1         7
    [procedure]                             8         17
    [p]                                     18        19
    [(]                                     20        21

    [+]                                     14        15

L4
    [select]                                2         8
    [@f]                                    9         11
L5
    [end]                                   1         4
